about-me.title: About me
about-me.description:
I'm Sara Arellano, a Front-end programmer specialized in Vanilla JavaScript, CSS with SASS as a preprocessor and Drupal.

I am passionate about learning new features and keep challenging myself.

Always making my work scalable and generic so it can be reused. Also, of course, always thinking about mobile first, responsive designs and improving the UX.

I really like being able to help my colleagues and, at the same time, learn from them.


Besides programming, my other hobbies are animals and my clarinet.

studies.title: Studies
studies.degree: Advertising and PR degree - College Rey Juan Carlos I, Madrid
studies.mckinsey: Front-end Development - Higher education Netmind / Endorsed by McKinsey (640h)

experience.title: Experience
experience.exp1descrp1: When I joined Selectra I knew nothing about Drupal and after a few days I was already creating components in Twig, JS Vanilla and SASS. I have also contributed to the creation of Selectra's own Design System where we use BEM, Atomic Design and all components are reusable.
experience.exp1descrp2: I have implemented measures to improve SEO and with my team we have managed to keep our pages from falling below 90/100. I am also responsible for 1 junior developer and am teaching the principles of programming to fellow Service Engineers. In addition to programming, I participate in interviews to attract new programmers and in the creation of exercises to check their level. Technical Stack: SASS, Vanilla JS, Gulp, NPM, Node.js, Twig, Pug, Drupal, PHP (basic), Docker (basic), Webpack, Sketch, inVision, Figma
experience.exp2descrp: Realization and design of several web pages, such as Navalpie
experience.exp3descrp: I wanted to know more about commercial work and was given the opportunity to start as an account manager. I dedicated myself to attracting new clients and maintaining current ones. Being a programmer, I understood the language and needs of the programmers and was able to "translate the language" of the client into real actions for the programmers.
experience.exp4descrp: Creation of web pages using React.js and Vue.js, CSS with SASS and FlexBox, Yarn, Git, Node.js, Sketch, Zeplin and DialogFlow to create conversational bots.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Do not hesitate to contact me for any questions or concerns
